caption: The Tackle Box here is $7 as opposed to $5 everywhere else. Took me 30 minutes to receive my order despite me being the only customer there. No receipt either. Highly recommend taking your business someplace else.

Fake! I honestly don’t think this is a real Popeyes, think “McDowells” in “Coming to America”.  Go an hour before closing and ask for fried chicken… Those Food will stare at you through their dead eyes and tell you they don’t have any??? I make the radical suggestion that they fry more! In all seriousness they assured me they’ll do that tomorrow???  An hour before close, and they just give up selling chicken!!

I order a large mash potato！！！ When I check my food it was so little，I ask the guy that was wearing Blue shirt（I think the name tap was the name Leo），Could you please scoop some more mash inside my food，That guy said I already give you 3 scoop of mash，what eles you want from me.* was nice and asking and he just change a bad attitude yelling at me. My mash did not have 3 scoop of mash.I can't believe this Popeyes have this type of management. Couldn't believe！If I was the owner I wouldn't allow this type of person work in my store.Wish you luck Leo，I will tell all of the friend around me never ever go to this store unless this guy is gone in this location. I need a sincere apology from LEO！！！
Took over 30 minutes wait for order 15 PCs chicken , will never go there again .

Interesting to see some of the comments here with the “blue shirt guy” ,“self-proclaimed manager Leo”, and “always talking on the phone”. It is likely the same guy, since I have experienced the same horrid service from this buffoon. It is a swamp of nasty vibe there, if the staff have no pride in what they do, imagine the lack of care they will put in your food (a good example, is how one guest found bone in their chicken sandwich!). The huge contrast in some guests receiving five star services while others are one star to none are beyond me. Either they are picking the type of guests they are willing to serve and the type they are ignoring or the few 5 stars reviews are simply bogus and are from family and friends of store. Either way, save yourself the guess work, spend your money elsewhere.

For a grand opening location the food was fresh and hot. The staff were so busy and kept their cool with friendly service. Ordered through the app and got my order in 5 mins. I'm so happy Popeyes opened in our neighborhood. Ill definitely be ordering at least once a week.  Wishing you great fortune. This place is the best! Thank you!

Despite visiting this location a few times without a hitch, my most recent visit served by the self-proclaimed  manager Leo was quite appalling, instead of focusing on customer service, this guy focused on self-importance with poor mannerism and demeanor that made the ordering process unnecessarily time consuming, repulsive, and quite aggravating. If you want to support a friendly and customer centric local franchise, this one is probably not it. Needless to say, I will be taking my patronage elsewhere until they have a “manager” that is more cultured, competent, and service-driven.
Good customer service! If I could have given out 10 stars I would have!
Manager and workers are Fair and kind. I ordered a 16 piece, wanted 4 breasts but they only had 2 left at the moment, so they gave me a few extra pieces 👍🏾Also, very clean and fast service !
username: Juan Almanzar tv see big we

caption: I’m glad they opened a Popeyes around this neighborhood! I received my food pretty fast today and the chicken was crispy and juicy 👏! Staff are friendly and respectful. Good luck with the business 👍!

What is this？？？A classic chicken sandwich with a bone chicken inside？？？the guy that made sandwich is talking on the phone all time while he taking my order and making sandwich After he give me the sandwich ，he sounds like yo ur order is done！ that was so rude！never come again，Bad attitude！

The blue shirt is talking on the phone while he is taking my order，I feel like DISRESPECT，After that I've been waiting my order for 15 min‘s for no reasonable，And that guy just keep on talking on the phone，and Not telling me that How long I have to wait.I am so disappointed. Never come again.Fuuuuuk that blue shirt guy！！！！！！
Very clean and fast service , workers are respectful .
Bad experience!!! Chicken very dry and the service is very bad. The workers over there are so rude! Never come back again
The stuff is rude.I won’t come back again.
I‘m very glad they opened Popeyes here！They can alway get my food in two minutes and thanks very much for their attentive service. And I‘m highly recommend their Tenders which tastes really good！
I buy the 11pc combo two times, one time give only ten pc, today give only 9pc, so bad
Pretty disorganized so far. Maybe because they just opened but it took 25 minutes to get my order of 3pc chicken tenders and spicy chicken combos..
i got my food in 2-4 min

Great Food and Service during their soft opening. Right now you can ou pay in cash, as its still a soft opening and there are some items on the menu not available yet. I can't wait until they are fully set to go. I normally don't carry cash, but when they can take other payments ill be there often.

A much needed fast food chain in this quiet neighborhood! I couldn't be more excited when seeing their "coming soon" sign, another optionnadded on to my list of take out options.  Feels great to see new businesses during these trying times.  Cash only! Take out only!
